summary.span: 抽象類別 (Abstract Class)，它會提供基底給 項目，這個項目可用於將 項目錨定至非固定格式內容.

span.span: An abstract class that provides a base for elements that are used to anchor elements to flow content.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness BorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.BorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的框線粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.

value.span: 此 結構，指定要套用的框線數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素框線的左邊的內容、 內容上方的框線的 10 個像素、 15 像素框線右邊的內容和 20 個像素框線下方的內容。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的框線，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 藍色，1/4 英吋框線圍繞在 Block 周圍](~/add/media/block-borders.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 圍繞在 Block 周圍的藍色，1/4 英吋框線")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_borders)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_borders)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定每行內容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 指定行高的雙精度浮點數值 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A double value specifying the height of line in device independent pixels.

value.span: 必須等於或大於0.0034而且等於或小於160000。

span.span: must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 值為(相當於屬性值"自動") 行高由目前字型特性自動決定的原因。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更此值不會變更相關聯的文字; 的高度相反地，它會變更行包含文字的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了這個屬性，版面配置中的總行受到其屬性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示法值等於或大於`0.0034`但比等於或小於`160000`。String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*值，上面所述 (但不支援`Auto`) 後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自動Auto 行高由目前字型特性自動決定的原因。Causes the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 相當於屬性值。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_lineheightxaml)] 下圖顯示先前範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how the previous example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument LineHeight")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight") 下圖顯示相同的範例使用的預設設定的轉譯方式 = 。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument lineheight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocument lineheight 為預設值")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_lineheight)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_lineheight)]

span.span: Raised if an attempt is made to set to a non-positive value.

member this.Margin : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的邊界粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 結構，指定要套用的邊界數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已超出項目的內容區域，此項目的內容區域的邊緣與父項目邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。 is buffer space that falls outside of an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 與相反，也就是落在項目的內容區域中，元素的內容與內部項目的邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside of an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素邊界的內容及內容上方邊界的 10 個像素、 15 像素的邊界，右邊的內容，內容下方邊界 20 個像素的左邊。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of margin to the left of content, 10 pixels of margin above content, 15 pixels of margin to the right of content, and 20 pixels of margin below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的邊界，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform margin of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. 如需圖例可誇張的粗細和色彩。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 段落與邊框距離及邊界](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 使用邊框距離及邊界的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的填補框線粗細。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding thickness for the element.

value.span: 結構，指定要套用的填補數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值是粗細一致的零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是落在項目的內容區域中，元素的內容與內部項目的邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。 is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. 與相反，也就是超出項目的內容區域，此項目的內容區域的邊緣與父項目邊緣之間的緩衝區空間。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls outside of an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素的邊框距離左邊的內容、 內容上方填補的 10 個像素、 15 像素的邊框間距右邊的內容和 20 個像素內容下方的填補。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的填補，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPaddingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_marginpaddingxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. 如需圖例可誇張的粗細和色彩。Exaggerated thicknesses and colors are used for illustration. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 段落與邊框距離及邊界](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 使用邊框距離及邊界的段落")![Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins](~/add/media/block-marginpadding.png "Screenshot: Paragraphs with padding and margins") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_marginpadding)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_MarginPadding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_marginpadding)]

value.span: 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的成員，用來指定需要的對齊方式。

span.span: A member of the enumerations specifying the desired alignment.
The default value is .
